standarddialogs-copy-btn:
Label of action button for duplicate dialog
{{Identical|Copy}}
standarddialogs-copy-title:
Title of duplicate dialog.
* $1 - Name of the page, the user is about to copy
standarddialogs-copy-page-new: Label for the input field for new page name
standarddialogs-copy-discussion: Label for the chekbox, that allows copying the pages discussion page as well, when checked
standarddialogs-copy-subpages: Label for the checkbox, that allowes copying the pages subpages as well, when checked
standarddialogs-page-info-title:
Title of page information dialog
* $1 - Name of the page, the information is from
standarddialogs-page-info-close:
Label of the button, that closes the information dialog.
{{Identical|Close}}
standarddialogs-page-info-general:
Label for the general information section in the menu of the page information dialog.
{{Identical|General}}
standarddialogs-page-info-history:
Label for the history section in the menu of the page information dialog.
{{Identical|Last edit}}
standarddialogs-page-info-properties:
Label for the properties section in the menu of the page information dialog.
{{Identical|Property}}
standarddialogs-page-info-page-length:
Label for page length in bytes.
{{Identical|Page length (in bytes)}}
standarddialogs-page-info-page-id:
Label for the page id.
{{Identical|Page ID}}
standarddialogs-page-info-page-model:
Label for the page content model.
{{Identical|Content model}}
standarddialogs-page-info-page-watch:
Label for the number of watchers of the page.
{{Identical|Number of watchers}}
standarddialogs-page-info-page-contribut:
Label for the number of editors of the page.
{{Identical|Contributor}}
standarddialogs-page-info-page-last-edit:
Label for the timestamp of last edit of the page.
{{Identical|Last edit}}

Label for name of last editor of the page.
{{Identical|Last editor}}
standarddialogs-page-info-page-templates:
Label for the templates of the page.
{{Identical|Template}}
standarddialogs-page-info-page-categorie:
Label for categories of the page.
{{Identical|Category}}
standarddialogs-page-info-page-internal:
Label for internal links of the page.
{{Identical|Internal links}}
standarddialogs-page-info-page-external:
Label for external links of the page.
{{Identical|External links}}
standarddialogs-page-info-page-images:
Label for images of the page.
{{Identical|Image}}
standarddialogs-new-page-title:
Title of the page creation dialog.
{{Identical|Create new page}}
standarddialogs-new-page-label:
Label for the page name input field of the new page dialog.
{{Identical|Page name}}
standarddialogs-new-page-not-exist-label: Label for those pages which do not exist
standarddialogs-new-subpage-label:
Label for the page name input field of the new subpage dialog.
{{Identical|Subpage}}
standarddialogs-create-button-new-page-t:
Text for the button, that opens the create new page dialog.
{{Identical|New page}}

Title for the button, that opens the create new page dialog.
{{Identical|Create a new page}}
standarddialogs-create-button-new-subpag:
Text for the button, that opens the create new subpage dialog.
{{Identical|New subpage}}

Title for the button, that opens the create new subpage dialog.
{{Identical|Create a new subpage}}
standarddialogs-delete-btn:
Label for the button, that allows deleting a page.
{{Identical|Delete}}
standarddialogs-delete-title:
Title for the dialog, that allows deleting a page.
{{Identical|Delete page "$1"}}.
* $1 - Name of the page that is going to be deleted
standarddialogs-move-btn:
Label for the button, that allows moving a page.
{{Identical|Move}}
standarddialogs-protect-btn:
Label for the button, that allows protecting a page.
{{Identical|Protect}}
standarddialogs-protect-title:
Title for the dialog that allows protecting a page.
{{Identical|Protect page "$1"}}.
* $1 - Name of the page that is going to be protected
standarddialogs-purge-btn:
Label for the button, that allows purging a page.
{{Identical|Refresh}}
standarddialogs-purge-title:
Title for the dialog that allows purging a page.
{{Identical|Refresh page "$1"}}.
* $1 - Name of the page that is going to be refreshed
standarddialogs-btn-done:
Label for primary action buttons of the dialogs.
{{Identical|Done}}
standarddialogs-btn-cancel:
Label for cancel buttons of the dialogs.
{{Identical|Cancel}}
standarddialogs-protect-level-editor:
Used as protect level.

See example: {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|action=info}}
standarddialogs-delete-subpages: Label for the checkbox, that allows deleting the pages subpages as well, when checked
standarddialogs-confirm-mass-deletion:
Message shown when the user tries to delete a large number pages at once.
* $1 - Number of pages to be deleted
standarddialogs-page-info-page-no-images: Text for table cell, which is used when page contains no images which can be listed
standarddialogs-page-info-page-no-templa: Text for table cell, which is used when page contains no templates which can be listed
standarddialogs-page-info-page-no-catego: Text for table cell, which is used when page contains no categories which can be listed
standarddialogs-page-info-page-no-links-: Text for table cell, which is used when page contains no links which can be listed
standarddialogs-page-info-page-no-extlin: Text for table cell, which is used when page contains no external links which can be listed
standarddialogs-validation-page-exist-in: Label for validation of title input. Shown if page title already exists
standarddialogs-delete-btn-label:
Label for primary action button of delete dialog.
{{Identical|Delete}}
standarddialogs-move-btn-label:
Label for primary action button of move dialog. Refers to moving (i.e. renaming) a wiki page.
{{Identical|Move}}
standarddialogs-copy-btn-label:
Label for primary action button of copy dialog.
{{Identical|Copy}}
standarddialogs-new-page-btn-label:
Label for primary action button of new page dialog.
{{Identical|Create}}
standarddialogs-new-subpage-btn-label:
Label for primary action button of new page dialog.
{{Identical|Create}}
standarddialogs-protect-btn-label:
Label for primary action button of protect dialog.
{{Identical|Protect}}
standarddialogs-purge-btn-label: Label for primary action button of purge dialog
